root.name: Guitar Hero
root.description: Features Guitar Hero features very similar music game interaction to its' brethren, and incorporates leaderboards, challenges, as well as avatar customization. GameplayGameplay is fast-paced and adds several concepts to the traditional tapping of rockin out on the iphonenotes. You’ll notice groups arrows sometimes coming down the guitar neck. When you see the arrows, instead of just touching them, you’ll have to swipe them in the direction that they are pointing! Another unique type of note are tied notes. When you see notes that are tied together by lines that means that you don’t have to lift your finger and touch each individual note, but instead you can drag your finger between them! ()these represent sliding down guitars neck Set List The setlsit for this app includes the following 6 tracks: We Are the Champions - Queen The music store offers further expansions. Savior - Rise Against Paint It Black - The Rolling Stones Seven Nation Army - The White Stripes Cousins - Vampire Weekend Say It Ain't So - WeezerIn addition to the songs above, many others are available for in-app purchase. They are served in three track packs, each pack costing $1 .99.
